description: This source file defines an API route for uploading and ingesting files, supporting multiple file types such as PDF, DOCX, TXT, CSV, and XLSX. It sets up an endpoint to handle file uploads, invokes an ingestion service, and returns a response with ingestion details.

methods.name: ingest_file( file: UploadFile = File(...), source_type: str = Form(..., description="One of: pdf, docx, txt, csv, xlsx"), filename: Optional[str] = Form(None), )
methods.description: API endpoint handler for ingesting files, which uploads a file, calls the ingestion service, and returns the result.

ctags.name: ingest_file
ctags.signature: ( file: UploadFile = File(...), source_type: str = Form(..., description="One of: pdf, docx, txt, csv, xlsx"), filename: Optional[str] = Form(None), )
